description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,

In the meanwhile we blocked the site as you requested, however we are still investigating the issue.


Sincerely,
Your CSIRT-U

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Dear Dr. Doe,

The issue was solved.
We would like to kindly ask you to change your password if you clicked on the link and inserted your credentials.


Sincerely,
Your CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team! I am glad that I did not click on the link.

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings,

It seems that index.html was deleted from your webserver. Please ask it department to upload it again. Unfortunately, we do not have enough details to find out who is responsible for that action. Please, if you can send us server logs(or ask the it department to do so) and we can make proper investigation.

Thank you.

Regards,
CSIRT-U

Greetings,

thank you very much. I will ask the colleagues.

Concerning the logs, you can try to contact our administrator.

Best regards,
JT

Greetings,

We connected with your administrator, please be patient, we are handling the issue.
May we ask if there are any updates from your colleagues.

Thank you,

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Thank you very much.

I do not have any news.

Best regards,
JT

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hello,

We would like to kindly ask you to change your password if you clicked on the link from email address it_department@mail.ex and inserted your credentials. This email which starts with part:

"
Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
...
"
We suspect this email address from phishing activity.

Sincerely,
Your CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

emails.content:
Hello,

We would like to kindly ask you to change your password if you clicked on the link from email address it_department@mail.ex and inserted your credentials. This email which starts with part:

Your Account will soon be suspended

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Greetings,

We would like to kindly ask you to send us logs on this website: nice-project.uni.ex from last 24 hours. 

Sincerely,
Your CSIRT-U

Greetings,

unless you specify why, I will not continue communication with you. Sorry.

Best regards,
Cloud provider

Greetings,

We, as CSIRT-U are investigating phishing activities connected with this website, therefore please cooperate with us as we needed to take appropriate action and temporarily block any incoming traffic from this server.

We would like unblock, but we need to investigate what is happening inside. Also it is connected with the request from our colleague( jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex) about unexpected state of this server.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Sorry, we don't have any logs. Please contact admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

Thank you for your cooperation and letting us know.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Greetings,

We, as CSIRT-U are investigating phishing activities connected with this website:nice-project.uni.ex , therefore please cooperate with us by sending us logs from last 24 hours as we needed to take appropriate action and temporarily block any incoming traffic from this server.

We would like unblockit , but we need to investigate what is happening inside. Also it is connected with the request from our colleague( jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex) about unexpected state of this server.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.

Regards,
Harris

Hello,

Can you please run `netstat -ano` in the shell and send us an output of this command.

We can find out if there is any connection from attacker based on that.

Thank you, 

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello, 

unfortunately not unless you specify why I must do it.

IP of the VM is 198.51.100.40, if it helps.

Regards,
Harris

Hello,

The reason behind this as we are trying to find out if an attacker is connected to the machine and can do any malicious activity as you do not have logging active.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U

Hello,

After you provide us with the output of the command. Please take an action and install logging system on all devices which are administrated by you and your team as is stated in our security IT policy.

Sincerely,
CSIRT-U
